analysis.description:
MintableToken.decimals (/unique_contracts/0xf612773e8e1daf16c65c5ab5e1268ae0ceca0c0e.sol#284-287) shadows:
	- BasicToken.decimals (/unique_contracts/0xf612773e8e1daf16c65c5ab5e1268ae0ceca0c0e.sol#85)

GNCCrowdsale.getTotalAmountOfTokens (/unique_contracts/0xf612773e8e1daf16c65c5ab5e1268ae0ceca0c0e.sol#459-485) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- currentPeriod == 1

MintableToken.claimTokens (/unique_contracts/0xf612773e8e1daf16c65c5ab5e1268ae0ceca0c0e.sol#312-323) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_contracts/0xf612773e8e1daf16c65c5ab5e1268ae0ceca0c0e.sol#321)

BasicToken.addressFundAdvisors should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xf612773e8e1daf16c65c5ab5e1268ae0ceca0c0e.sol#87-88)
